hero.title: Ori-OS changelog
hero.subtitle: New features, improvements, and fixes shipped to your Revenue OS.

changes.text: Added cross-workspace dashboards so agencies can view performance across selected client workspaces.
Improved suppression list management and visibility for workspace admins.
Fixed a rare issue where reply statuses were not updating in real time for some mailboxes.
Introduced lawful-basis fields at list and contact level to support GDPR-aware outbound.
Exports can now include lawful-basis labels and notes.
Clarified consent and compliance settings in workspace configuration.
Added pre-built automation templates for first-touch campaigns, re-engagement, and simple handovers.
Improved workflow run logs to make debugging easier.

footerNote: Looking for something specific? Check our documentation or contact support for help.
